name: Grand Hyatt Mumbai
address: Bandra Kurla Complex Vicinity, Off Western Express Highway, Santacruz East, Mumbai, Maharashtra 400055
about: A multi-dimensional lifestyle complex, Grand Hyatt Mumbai offers a modern and luxurious retreat in the heart of the city, with award-winning dining, an international shopping plaza, and expansive rooms.

name: Hyatt Regency Dharamshala Resort
address: Village Dharamkot, McLeod Ganj, Dharamshala, Himachal Pradesh 176219
about: Nestled in the scenic Dhauladhar range, this resort offers a tranquil retreat with luxurious rooms, a spa, and stunning mountain views. It's a perfect base to explore the spiritual and natural beauty of Dharamshala.

name: Hyatt Regency Dehradun
address: Mussoorie Rd, Salan Gaon, Dehradun, Uttarakhand 248009
about: Situated at the foothills of the Himalayas, this hotel offers a scenic and refreshing experience. It's an ideal destination for both leisure and business travelers, with modern amenities and large event spaces.

name: Hyatt Regency Ahmedabad
about: Centrally located, this hotel offers easy access to the business district and cultural sites. It features contemporary rooms, diverse dining options, and views of the Sabarmati river.
